name: Star Shatter
description:
OVERVIEW

This is my first solo submission for Ryan Laley's Spring Game Jam 
I've always loved the space shooter drift genre and wanted to take a stab at it. This was a 48-hour game jam and I probably put 20 hours into it. I hope you enjoy the twist on the classic asteroid-clone.

Rules & Controls:

Customize your ship before the game starts!

Fight enemies while keeping your ship repaired.

Your Shields and HP regen slowly but your generator might go down so you'll have to reconnect it mid-battle.

On a collision your Weapons might get jammed. You'll have to reconnect those too if you want to stay in the fight.

Survive the waves and get the highest score!

W-key to fly in the direction of your Mouse

Left-click to shoot

Click the Red Buttons to repair your Weapons/Regeneration
